markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winglets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2384) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're among the few kobolds who grow a set of draconic wings later in life. The wings are initially small and weak; while not enough for full flight, a strong flap allows you to jump further. When [Leaping](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) horizontally, you move an additional 5 feet (this additional distance isn't cumulative with the increased Leap distance from the [Powerful Leap](/Feats.aspx?ID=820) feat). You don't automatically fail your checks to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) if you don't Stride at least 10 feet first. In addition, when you attempt a Long Jump, you can jump a distance up to 10 feet longer than you normally would based on the result of your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check, though you still can't jump farther than your Speed.

<title level="2">Winglets leads to...</title>
[Hatchling Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=2389)
name: Winglets
